Meet the Community!

We provide a variety of ways to communicate with and learn from the Gluster community.

IRC Chat

#gluster channel on irc.gnu.org.

Directly chat with the core developers and other Gluster experts on the IRC channel.

User Mailing list

Gluster Users

General discussion about GlusterFS installation, use and related topics, by users and developers.

» Archived past discussions

Devel Mailing list

Gluster Devel

More in-depth Gluster development discussion, by core Gluster developers

» Archived past discussions

Bug Tracker

» Report a problem in Gluster

» Report a problem in Documentation

Gluster uses the Red Hat Bugzilla for development and bug tracking. Gluster can be found in the Community Projects section.

Twitter

@glusterorg

Gluster.org presence on Twitter is a great way to stay current with announcements and news.

Gluster Meetups

Find other Gluster users and developers near you!

» Check for a local Gluster community!
